port: miditest
#
# Integration test config for virtual MIDI device
# Maps each message to an echo command that outputs identifiable text
#
# Message 1: pitchwheel on channel 10
pitchwheel channel=10: echo "PITCHWHEEL:$MIDI_VALUE"
#
# Message 2: control_change channel 10, control 9
control_change channel=10 control=9: echo "CC_CONTROL_9:$MIDI_VALUE"
#
# Message 3: control_change channel 10, control 18
control_change channel=10 control=18: echo "CC_CONTROL_18:$MIDI_VALUE"
#
# Message 4: control_change channel 10, control 26
control_change channel=10 control=26: echo "CC_CONTROL_26:$MIDI_VALUE"
#
# Message 5: control_change channel 10, control 1
control_change channel=10 control=1: echo "CC_CONTROL_1:$MIDI_VALUE"
